casebody.data:
Thursday, November 1, 2001

MOTION DOCKET

01-948. Vandalia-Butler City School Dist. Bd. of Edn. v. Montgomery Cty. Bd. of Revision.

Board of Tax Appeals, No. 98-M-1013. This cause is pending before the court as an appeal from the Board of Tax Appeals.

*1303IT IS ORDERED by the court, sua sponte, that this cause be consolidated with Supreme Court case No. 01-949, Vandaliar-Butler City School Dist. Bd. ofEdn. v. Montgomery Cty. Bd. of Revision et al., for oral argument and decision.
